com.diogonunes.jcdp.bw

Class Printer.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.diogonunes.jcdp.bw.Printer.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Printer

    public static class Printer.Builder
extends Object
    Builder pattern: allows the caller to specify the attributes that it wants to change and keep the default values in the others.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Builder

        public Builder(Printer.Types type)
        Constructor of static printers. The printer returned is one of the implementations offered by the library. By default the Printer created has zero level of debug, timestamping is active with format according to ISO 8601.
        Parameters:
        type - of implementation wanted, use one of Printer.Types
